reviews.name: Intellectual Architect
reviews.subject: Lightweight Warmth!
reviews.comment: Great jacket! Lightweight, warm and the two zippers make it customizable. Sadly, my hubby wanted the green to be different, so I had to return it. Perfect otherwise.

reviews.name: UA Strm Armour down parka
reviews.subject: Product is gret
reviews.comment: Shipping was fast. The jacket itself was very comfortable and definitely kept me warm. I was satisfied with the overall fit of the jacket as well.

reviews.name: Jag812
reviews.subject: Perfect for cold weather
reviews.comment: The Men's UA Storm Armour Down Parka is perfect for cold weather, wind and even rain. The fit was spot on since I wear a medium, 5'7, 170LBS. I highly recommend it since I was looking for something that would be ideal for winter.

reviews.name: EFR410
reviews.comment: GREAT WINTER COAT. LIGHT WEIGHT & VERY WARM

reviews.name: Cobes
reviews.subject: This coat fits perfectly and is incredibly warm.
reviews.comment: This coat fits exactly how I wanted it to and is the perfect length. The coat is very warm as soon as you put it on and keeps you warm the entire time you are wearing it. The zipper that goes up past your neck is the first coat I've had in a long time that does not rub up against and irate my neck. I like my coat so much that I stopped looking forward to springtime.
